resources.string: Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!

BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) is a measurment 
 of the number of calories needed to perform 
 our body's most basic functionlike breathing,
 circulation,cell production etc

A calorie is a unit that is used to measure
 energy. The Calorie you see on a food package
 is actually a kilocalorie, or 1,000 calories.
 A Calorie (kcal) is the amount of energy needed
 to raise the temperature of 1 kilogram of water 
 1 degree Celsius.
 1. 1 gram carb=4 calories.
 2. 1 gram protien =4 calories
 3. 1 gram fact= 9 calories

This diet contains 20-30 percent carbohydrate,
 35-45 percent protein,and 30-35 percent fat.
 In this type of diet carbohydrate should not
 contain more than 20-30 percent.
For maintenance of weight zone diet is perfect.\n Here carbohydrates contains 40 percent, protein \n 30 percent and fat 30 percent.

In high carb diet carbohydrate contains
 60 percent and the others are 25 percent
 protein and 15 percent fat. This diet is
 for those who want to gain weight.
